tv.generator-info-name: WebGrab+Plus/w MDB & REX Postprocess -- version V3.2.0.0 -- Jan van Straaten

programme.title: O Segredo de Kalinka
programme.desc: Baseado na história verídica de André Bamberski, um pai que durante 27 anos lutou para trazer à justiça o assassino da sua filha, Kalinka, morta em circunstâncias perturbadoras.

programme.title: Hit and Run
programme.desc: Uma noite de festejos transforma-se num verdadeiro pesadelo para a aluna Mary Murdock, depois de colidir numa estrada escura e regressar a casa e encontrar um homem morto pendurado no para-choques do carro. Em pânico, ela enterra-o na floresta e regressa a casa para esconder as pistas.

programme.title: Os Reis do Submundo
programme.desc: Harlem, anos 30. Após cumprir uma pena, Bumpy Johnson torna-se guarda-costas de Stephanie St. Clair, a rainha da loteria. O seu negócio de apostas ilegais é cobiçado por Dutch Schultz, que faz com que ela seja presa. Bumpy fica à frente da empresa, mas os planos de Schultz desencadeiam uma guerra.

programme.title: My One Christmas Wish
programme.desc: Baseado na história verídica de uma jovem que tenta recompor a vida depois de sair das ruas e ganhar uma bolsa de estudo na faculdade. Depois de publicar um anúncio em que procura uma família para passar o dia de Natal, acaba por encontrar famílias para mais jovens que estavam sozinhos.

programme.title: Time For Me To Come Home For Christmas
programme.desc: Cara tem pela frente um Natal amargo. Num voo para Oklahoma conhece o cantor Heath, que também enfrenta uma quadra difícil devido ao falecimento do pai. Cara e Heath partilham as suas perdas e, à medida que se aproximam do seu destino natalício, ficam também cada vez mais próximos um do outro.

programme.title: Casa de Doidas
programme.desc: O dono de um cabaré gay e o seu companheiro, uma 'drag queen', concordam em fazer-se passar por heterossexuais para que o seu filho possa apresentá-los aos pais da noiva.

programme.title: A Comuna
programme.desc: Nos anos 70, o casal Erik e Anna realiza um sonho e, juntamente com a filha, monta uma comuna em Copenhaga. Há amizade, amor e vida em conjunto debaixo do mesmo teto, até que um devastador caso de amor sujeita a comuna ao seu maior teste.

programme.title: Seis Graus de Separação
programme.desc: Um casal abastado recebe em casa, a meio da noite, um rapaz ferido que diz ser amigo dos seus filhos, ambos na universidade. O jovem diz ainda ser filho do ator Sidney Poitier e é recebido na casa sem grandes reservas...

programme.title: Fala Comigo
programme.desc: A vida e carreira de Petey Greene, um afro-americano que, ao sair da prisão, se torna animador de rádio. Em plenos anos 60, deu voz aos negros do seu país.

programme.title: Retroactive
programme.desc: Karen tem um acidente no deserto do Texas e é ajudada por Frank. Quando este descobre que a esposa lhe é infiel, mata-a. Karen foge e encontra um laboratório com uma máquina do tempo que é ativada, fazendo com que recue 20 minutos. Karen utiliza esse tempo para tentar impedir o homicídio.

programme.title: Dragões Americanos
programme.desc: Tony Luca é um detetive nova-iorquino que sem querer estraga o seu disfarce durante uma investigação à mafia. Este erro resulta numa transferência para o departamento de homicídios e o seu parceiro passa a ser Kim, da polícia de Seul. Inicialmente distantes, acabam por se tornar inseparáveis.

programme.title: O Caçador de Crocodilos: Rota de Colisão
programme.desc: O aventureiro Steve Irwin e a sua esposa Terri têm a missão de salvar um crocodilo de um grupo de caçadores. Durante essa aventura, pelo interior da Austrália, eles descobrem que o réptil engoliu um valioso artefacto dos Serviços Secretos norte-americanos.

programme.title: The Enchanted Christmas Cake
programme.desc: Um programa de televisão aparece na cidade com a intenção de roubar a famosa receita de uma pasteleira: um bolo de Natal encantado. Até que a pasteleira Gwen Miller é apanhada entre o seu interesse romântico no diretor do programa, Gavin Wright, e a sua lealdade à falecida avó.

programme.title: Todos os Cães Merecem o Céu 2
programme.desc: Os cães que todos gostam estão de volta para mais uma aventura musical. Todos os cães vão para o céu e só alguns sortudos regressam à Terra. É isso que acontece quando o cão travesso Charlie Barkin e os amigos Itchy e Sasha recebem ordens para recuperarem um objeto de Gabriel que foi roubado no céu.

programme.title: Never Kiss a Man In a Christmas Sweater
programme.desc: Para a mãe solteira Maggie O'Donnell, o Natal sempre foi uma celebração da família, mas este ano, a filha Ellen vai passar a época com o pai e Maggie enfrenta o seu primeiro Natal sozinha. Até que literalmente dá de caras com Lucas Cavelli num parque de estacionamento numa loja de árvores de Natal.

programme.title: Assassination Tango
programme.desc: O assassino veterano nova-iorquino John J. recebe a missão mais difícil: viajar até Buenos Aires, eliminar um general corrupto e voltar para os EUA em menos de três dias. Mas o golpe é adiado e John acaba por vaguear pelos clubes de tango, deixando-se seduzir por uma sensual bailarina.

programme.title: O Segredo de Kalinka
programme.desc: Baseado na história verídica de André Bamberski, um pai que durante 27 anos lutou para trazer à justiça o assassino da sua filha, Kalinka, morta em circunstâncias perturbadoras.

programme.title: Peões em Jogo
programme.desc: Stephen Malley, um professor idealista, tenta inspirar um estudante a fazer mais com a sua vida, enquanto um senador carismático apresenta uma nova estratégia de guerra no Médio Oriente a uma céptica jornalista. No Afeganistão, dois antigos alunos de Malley lutam pela liberdade e pela vida.

programme.title: O Quadrado
programme.desc: Christian é o respeitado curador de um museu de arte contemporânea. A sua próxima exposição, "O Quadrado", pretende evocar o altruísmo em quem a vê. Mas quando o seu telefone é roubado, irá demonstrar que nem sempre é fácil viver à altura dos nossos ideais...

programme.title: Mestres da Ilusão 2
programme.desc: Um ano após os eventos relatados no primeiro filme, em que arrebataram o público ao mesmo tempo que conseguiram enganar o FBI, os Quatro Cavaleiros regressam aos palcos.

programme.title: Dredd
programme.desc: Numa cidade violenta e futurista, Dredd é o derradeiro juiz e está determinado a salvar a cidade do seu mais recente flagelo: uma perigosa droga, que permite aos seus utilizadores experimentarem a realidade numa fração da sua velocidade normal.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
Mentes Criminosas
programme.desc:
Criminal Minds: Created by Jeff Davis. With Matthew Gray Gubler, Kirsten Vangsness, A.J. Cook, Joe Mantegna. The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strike again." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0452046/","name":"Criminal Minds","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGE2ZmFkZTYtNjRiOS00ZjE3LThjOWMtZTViZjRmNDFjNTQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strik","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0452046/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ccreech"},"dateCreated":"2005-10-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"I like the content and the characterizations of "Criminal Minds."","reviewBody":"I have watched each episode of Criminal Minds, and I agree with the writer from Canada about this show (and also about their comments on NCIS, which seems to have more spark and humor than the other CSI shows).

Mandy Patinkin turns anything he's in to pure gold, and I hope "Criminal Minds" will get a long run! The plots are engaging, the cast interacts well together, and nobody comes off as being too "preachy," as you get with some of the CSIs and Law & Orders.

Thanks for the opportunity to support a fine show which is up against some tough competition. I watched "Lost" quite a bit it's first season, but finally got bored with it because it never seemed to have any resolution. Just episode upon episode of wondering why it wasn't going anywhere. In other words, "Lost" lost me! And I'm starting to get that same feeling with "Desperate Housewives," too. When I was a kid I really enjoyed ongoing serials; but not that much anymore.... 

Shows like Criminal Minds and Numbers and NCIS manage to make you think you've watched a complete story; and from my point of view, I respond to that kind of entertainment much, much better!"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":179776,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2005-09-22","keywords":"serial killer,serial murder,murder,21st century,2000s","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1131557/","name":"Matthew Gray Gubler"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1494536/","name":"Kirsten Vangsness"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0176882/","name":"A.J. programme.title: Os Filhos do Homem
programme.desc: Em 2027, o ser humano está à beira da extinção: os homens perderam a capacidade de procriar e, por algum motivo que se desconhece, as mulheres tornaram-se estéreis. Ao mesmo tempo, o mundo estremece quando morre um jovem de 18 anos, a pessoa mais jovem do planeta. A situação é caótica.

programme.title: Homem-Aranha
programme.desc: Órfão desde tenra idade, Peter Parker é um estudante que trabalha como fotógrafo no Daily Bugle. Durante uma experiência com aranhas, Peter é mordido por um espécime manipulado geneticamente. Pouco depois, descobre que possui uns poderes pouco habituais.

programme.title: Homem-Aranha 2
programme.desc: A vida de Peter Parker complica-se, porque é cada vez mais difícil conciliar a sua faceta de Homem-Aranha com a sua identidade de todos os dias. Em plena posse dos seus poderes, o super-herói dá agora de caras com o Dr. Octopus, outro homem de ciência com contornos monstruosos.

programme.title: Homem-Aranha 3
programme.desc: Aparentemente, Peter Parker conseguiu um equilíbrio entre a sua devoção por Mary Jane e as suas obrigações como super-herói. Mas uma tempestade está a formar-se no horizonte...

programme.title: Homem-Aranha: Regresso a Casa
programme.desc: Entusiasmado com a sua recente experiência com os Vingadores, Peter regressa a casa, sob o olhar vigilante do seu novo mentor, Tony Stark. No entanto, quando Vulture surge como o novo vilão, tudo o que é mais importante para Peter, o Homem-Aranha, fica ameaçado...

programme.title: Homem-Aranha: Longe de Casa
programme.desc: Peter Parker e os amigos estão de viagem à Europa. Apesar do entusiasmo inicial, eles não vão ter tempo para descansar. Peter tem de ajudar Nick Fury a desvendar o mistério por detrás das criaturas que têm provocado desastres e destruição pelo continente fora.

programme.title: Mestres da Ilusão 2
programme.desc: Um ano após os eventos relatados no primeiro filme, em que arrebataram o público ao mesmo tempo que conseguiram enganar o FBI, os Quatro Cavaleiros regressam aos palcos.

programme.title: S.W.A.T. - Força de Intervenção
programme.desc: Alex Montell, um traficante de droga, é transportado pela Polícia de Los Angeles e mantido em custódia federal. Mas tudo se complica quando o prisioneiro oferece 100 milhões de dólares a quem o libertar.

programme.title: Castle
programme.sub-title: In the Belly of the Beast

programme.title: Dredd
programme.desc: Numa cidade violenta e futurista, Dredd é o derradeiro juiz e está determinado a salvar a cidade do seu mais recente flagelo: uma perigosa droga, que permite aos seus utilizadores experimentarem a realidade numa fração da sua velocidade normal.

programme.title: Matem o Mensageiro
programme.desc: Webb descobre uma história que o leva a investigar as origens da epidemia de crack que assolou as ruas. Fica a saber do envolvimento da CIA no contrabando de cocaína, usando os lucros para armar os rebeldes na Nicarágua. Webb atrai um tipo de atenção que ameaça a sua carreira e a sua família.

programme.title: Homem-Aranha: Regresso a Casa
programme.desc: Entusiasmado com a sua recente experiência com os Vingadores, Peter regressa a casa, sob o olhar vigilante do seu novo mentor, Tony Stark. No entanto, quando Vulture surge como o novo vilão, tudo o que é mais importante para Peter, o Homem-Aranha, fica ameaçado...

programme.title: Homem-Aranha: Longe de Casa
programme.desc: Peter Parker e os amigos estão de viagem à Europa. Apesar do entusiasmo inicial, eles não vão ter tempo para descansar. Peter tem de ajudar Nick Fury a desvendar o mistério por detrás das criaturas que têm provocado desastres e destruição pelo continente fora.

programme.title: No Limite do Amanhã
programme.desc: Quando a Terra é invadida por uma impiedosa e imbatível raça alienígena, o inexperiente major William Cage é arrastado para a linha da frente. Morre em poucos minutos, mas entra numa repetição temporal que o força a reviver o combate vezes sem conta.

programme.title: Blade Runner 2049
programme.desc: K, um novo blade runner da Polícia de Los Angeles, desvenda um segredo há muito enterrado que pode mergulhar no caos o que resta da sociedade. Esta descoberta leva-o numa missão para localizar Rick Deckard, um antigo blade runner da Polícia de Los Angeles, desaparecido há 30 anos.

programme.title: O Segredo dos Kennedy
programme.desc: A história dos sete dias mais difíceis na carreira do senador Ted Kennedy, que começam numa festa dos colaboradores da campanha de Bobby Kennedy na Ilha de Chappaquiddick. Ted abandona a festa cedo e oferece-se para dar uma fatídica boleia...

programme.title: Variações
programme.desc: O retrato da vida de António Ribeiro, barbeiro e figura da movida lisboeta nos anos 70, que perseguiu o seu sonho de se tornar cantor e compositor. Apesar de não saber, inicialmente, nada de música, viria a transformar-se no excêntrico António Variações.

programme.title: Um Pai à Maneira
programme.desc: Sonny Kaufax é um adulto irresponsável. À medida que os amigos casam, percebe que, se não fizer nada, a sua vida vai ser sempre assim. Quando a namorada o deixa, toma uma medida drástica: adota Julian, um menino que foi abandonado à sua porta. Sem qualquer experiência, resolve criá-lo à sua maneira.

programme.title: Serenity
programme.desc: Num futuro longínquo, um grupo de rebeldes luta contra um governo totalitário que exerce controlo absoluto sobre os habitantes do sistema solar. Um soldado da guerra civil galáctica consegue sobreviver à custa de pequenas ilegalidades, bem como por comandar a nave de transporte "Serenity".

programme.title: Criminosos à Solta
programme.desc: Quatro homens, filhos de mafiosos de Brooklyn, juntam-se para recuperar um saco de dinheiro, que um deles deveria ter levado ao seu pai. Só que este foi apreendido pelo xerife corrupto de uma pequena cidade.

programme.title: A Máquina do Tempo
programme.desc: O cientista e inventor Alexander Hartdegen quer demonstrar que é possível viajar no tempo, construindo uma máquina para esse efeito. Alexander pretende voltar ao passado, mais concretamente à altura em que uma tragédia pessoal o deixou desolado, mas acaba por ser enviado para um futuro distante.

programme.title: O Castor
programme.desc: Walter Black é um homem cuja depressão tomou conta da sua vida. Sem saber mais o que fazer para o ajudar, e temendo que aquela prostração prejudique o crescimento dos filhos de ambos, Meredith, a sua mulher, opta pelo divórcio. É então que Walter encontra um "castor-fantoche".

programme.title: O Jardim da Esperança
programme.desc: A história verídica de uma mulher que salvou centenas de vidas, durante a Segunda Guerra Mundial. A gerir com o marido o zoo de Varsóvia, os dois colaboram com a Resistência e resgatam pessoas do Gueto de Varsóvia, colocando-se em risco, bem como a tudo o que construíram.

programme.title: 13 Fantasmas
programme.desc: Arthur Kriticos e os seus dois filhos, Kathy e Bobby, perderam tudo. Um incêndio levou-lhes Jean, a mãe e esposa, assim como todos os seus bens. Inesperadamente, Arthur recebe a herança do excêntrico tio Cyrus. Mas a herança traz uma desagradável surpresa no bico.

programme.title: Os Maias - Cenas da Vida Romântica
programme.desc: Como médico aristocrata, Carlos leva uma vida ociosa na companhia do seu amigo e escritor de obras "inacabadas" João da Ega. Um dia conhece Maria Eduarda, uma mulher bela e cheia de mistérios que acabou de chegar à capital. A paixão é recíproca e os dois vivem um amor cego...

programme.title: O Estranho Caso de Benjamin Button
programme.desc: Às portas da morte, Daisy pede à filha para ler, em voz alta, o diário de Benjamin Button. O velho amigo de Daisy relata a sua vida extraordinária, marcada irremediavelmente pelo facto bizarro de ter nascido já octogenário. Ao contrário do habitual, Benjamin vai rejuvenescendo com o passar dos anos.

programme.title: Roda Gigante
programme.desc: No meio da agitação do Parque de Diversões de Coney Island, na década de 50, a vida de quatro personagens cruza-se: Ginny, uma ex-atriz que agora é empregada de mesa, o seu marido Humpty, operador de carrossel, Mickey, um atraente salva vidas, e uma visita inesperada.

programme.title: Olhos Grandes
programme.desc: No final dos anos 1950, o pintor Walter Keane alcançou um sucesso inacreditável com as suas pinturas de crianças com olhos grandes. A chocante verdade acaba, no entanto, por ser descoberta: as obras de Walter eram criadas pela sua mulher, Margaret.

programme.title: O Nevoeiro
programme.desc: Numa cidade, prestes a festejar o seu centenário, os habitantes tornam-se vítimas de espetros assassinos que escondem um segredo inquietante.

programme.title: Um Pai à Maneira
programme.desc: Sonny Kaufax é um adulto irresponsável. À medida que os amigos casam, percebe que, se não fizer nada, a sua vida vai ser sempre assim. Quando a namorada o deixa, toma uma medida drástica: adota Julian, um menino que foi abandonado à sua porta. Sem qualquer experiência, resolve criá-lo à sua maneira.

programme.title: 12 Anos Escravo
programme.desc: Na pré-Guerra Civil dos Estados Unidos, Solomon Northup, um homem negro livre de Nova Iorque, é raptado e vendido como escravo. Durante 12 anos, Solomon luta não só para se manter vivo, mas também para preservar a sua dignidade. Até que conhece um abolicionista do Canadá que vai mudar a sua vida.

programme.title: Gladiador
programme.desc: No campo de batalha, o general romano Maximus é o homem de confiança do imperador Marcus Aurelius. Mas o seu reinado acaba quando o seu filho Commodus o mata para subir ao trono. O jovem e instável imperador decide acabar também com a vida de Maximus: vendido como escravo, torna-se gladiador.

programme.title: Era uma Vez em Los Angeles
programme.desc: Steve Ford é um detetive privado de Los Angeles que já conheceu melhores dias. Quando o seu cão de estimação é roubado por um conhecido gangue, Steve terá de fazer alguns favores aos criminosos para o recuperar... e os sarilhos começam!

programme.title: Teoria da Conspiração
programme.desc: Jerry Fletcher, um taxista de Nova Iorque, e Alice Sutton, funcionária do Ministério da Justiça, veem-se envolvidos numa complexa conspiração política.

programme.title: Olha Quem Fala
programme.desc: Mollie é uma mãe solteira à procura do pai perfeito para o seu filho. Mas Mickey, o bebé, vai fazer tudo para que a sua mãe perceba que o companheiro e pai ideal está mesmo ao seu lado.

programme.title: O Melga
programme.desc: Um desconhecido, com um caráter extravagante e um pouco inquietante, intromete-se na vida de um jovem arquiteto de quem se quer tornar o melhor amigo.

programme.title: O Segredo dos Kennedy
programme.desc: A história dos sete dias mais difíceis na carreira do senador Ted Kennedy, que começam numa festa dos colaboradores da campanha de Bobby Kennedy na Ilha de Chappaquiddick. Ted abandona a festa cedo e oferece-se para dar uma fatídica boleia...

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: Chappie é o primeiro robô com a capacidade de pensar e sentir por si mesmo. Contudo, essa é uma ideia perigosa e um desafio que colocará Chappie no caminho de poderosas e destrutivas forças, que pretendem que ele seja o último da sua espécie.

programme.title: As Armas de Jane
programme.desc: Jane construiu uma nova vida com o seu marido Bill e a filha, nas perigosas planícies do Oeste. Mas quando este se envolve num tiroteio com John Bishop e regressa ferido, ela tem a certeza que Bishop não irá parar até que toda a família seja morta.

programme.title: Money Monster
programme.desc: Lee Gates, um apresentador de televisão que é uma espécie de "guru" de Wall Street, é mantido refém com a sua equipa e produtora, durante a emissão do seu programa em direto, por um investidor irado. Em tempo real, terão de encontrar forma de se manterem vivos e desvendarem uma teia de mentiras.

programme.title: Linha Mortal
programme.desc: Cinco estudantes de Medicina, obcecados com o mistério que rodeia os limites da vida, embarcam numa perigosa experiência. Devem parar o coração durante pequenos períodos de tempo, mas estas experiências perigosas trazem consequências sobrenaturais.

programme.title: A História de uma Vaqueira
programme.desc: Dusty Rhodes, uma jovem vaqueira do Texas, e o avô apoiam-se na sua fé e um no outro enquanto os pais dela combatem na Guerra do Afeganistão.

programme.title: Querida Eleanor
programme.desc: Em 1962, durante o caos da crise dos mísseis em Cuba, duas adolescentes viajam através dos Estados Unidos em busca de Eleanor Roosevelt.

programme.title: Outlander
Outlander
programme.desc:
Outlander: Created by Ronald D. Moore. With Caitriona Balfe, Sam Heughan, Duncan Lacroix, Sophie Skelton. An English combat nurse from 1945 is mysteriously swept back in time to 1743." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt3006802/","name":"Outlander","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDVlYTg5NjYtZGRkYS00NjdhLWI4MWUtNmU3MGQ3MWI1MWE5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"An English combat nurse from 1945 is mysteriously swept back in time to 1743.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3006802/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"mcampbelljh1"},"dateCreated":"2014-08-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"An excellent adaptation of the books for all us Outlander fans!","reviewBody":"I've recently been reading (actually listening to the audio-books) the Outlander series of books having completed 5 so far so when I saw the Starz TV series was coming out I just had to watch it. I must say I loved the Outlander books, but I'm not a fanatic when it comes to translating books to the screen they are very different mediums and thus can take on a different look and feel and that's OK with me. In this case, I don't think people who are would be disappointed anyway as the screen writers did an excellent job of translating the 1st part of the book to the screen (I've only seen the 1st episode but I'm already hooked so I'm sure I'll enjoy the rest). 

I loved their choice of actors to take on the roles of Jamie, Claire, Frank and Dugan. Sam Heughan is perfect as Jamie Fraser (just the right bit of good looks and ruggedness one might expect in Jamie). Caitriona Balfe also seemed like a good choice for Claire (beautiful yet strong enough to carry the role). I think Frank/Jack Randall's portrayal by Tobias Menzies will also fit my vision of Frank/Jack and I think he can carry off both roles one as the wicked Jack and the other as the loving yet dull Frank (when compared to Jamie). And the Scottish actors like Graham McTavish (Dougal) will bring old Scotland to life on the screen for me. 

From the 1st episode I think they producers will not be shy to include the more sexual aspects of the Outlander books, as they do have this erotic element that actually makes the love between Claire and Jamie the driving force of their relationship which allows it to span centuries, even when they are no longer together. It's that love/passion for each other that keeps them alive in each other's heart and so far to the directors credit, they have not been shy about adding it. I'm looking forward to the Claire Jamie love scenes hopefully to come... I'm also going to enjoy the Scottish history and scenery, and loved the way they so far have included it in the TV series. It's going to be very interesting to me especially as my ancestors are Scottish.

I know Starz will be increasing its revenues with this series' fans all signing up just to see it. There must be millions of us around the world that love these books and I'm sure like me many of them will order the cable channel just to watch this. I'm very happy to see Starz did such a good job in bringing this to life on the screen. So rarely do we get a good adult drama on TV these days, and this will surely be that. I'm liking many of the original show Starz is offering this season like this and Black Sails, Strikback. Who ever is heading their creative development deserves a lot of credit for their selection of shows to produce. I think Starz is catching up to HBO and Showtime in it's original shows and might even surpass them if it keeps producing shows of this quality plus they have a much better selection of movies that the other channels. As a new Starz member, I'd recommend it to others.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":140339,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.4},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Fantasy","Romance"],"datePublished":"2014-08-09","keywords":"scotland,scotsman,year 1743,scottish highlands,sex scene","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1495520/","name":"Caitriona Balfe"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1537825/","name":"Sam Heughan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3795370/","name":"Duncan Lacroix"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0303436/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0410831/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0208971/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0601822/","name":"Ronald D. Moore"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 6 Teaser","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3784950553","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjVhNmU2YTgtZjg2ZC00MDRmLWI1MTQtZjMwMmY3YmZjN2YxXkEyXkFqcGdeQWxiaWFtb250._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjVhNmU2YTgtZjg2ZC00MDRmLWI1MTQtZjMwMmY3YmZjN2YxXkEyXkFqcGdeQWxiaWFtb250._V1_.jpg","description":"An English combat nurse from 1945 is mysteriously swept back in time to 1743."}}</script><metacontent="

An English combat nurse from 1945 is mysteriously swept back in time to 1743." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt3006802/","name":"Outlander","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDVlYTg5NjYtZGRkYS00NjdhLWI4MWUtNmU3MGQ3MWI1MWE5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"An English combat nurse from 1945 is mysteriously swept back in time to 1743.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3006802/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"mcampbelljh1"},"dateCreated":"2014-08-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"An excellent adaptation of the books for all us Outlander fans!","reviewBody":"I've recently been reading (actually listening to the audio-books) the Outlander series of books having completed 5 so far so when I saw the Starz TV series was coming out I just had to watch it. I must say I loved the Outlander books, but I'm not a fanatic when it comes to translating books to the screen they are very different mediums and thus can take on a different look and feel and that's OK with me. In this case, I don't think people who are would be disappointed anyway as the screen writers did an excellent job of translating the 1st part of the book to the screen (I've only seen the 1st episode but I'm already hooked so I'm sure I'll enjoy the rest). 

I loved their choice of actors to take on the roles of Jamie, Claire, Frank and Dugan. Sam Heughan is perfect as Jamie Fraser (just the right bit of good looks and ruggedness one might expect in Jamie). Caitriona Balfe also seemed like a good choice for Claire (beautiful yet strong enough to carry the role). I think Frank/Jack Randall's portrayal by Tobias Menzies will also fit my vision of Frank/Jack and I think he can carry off both roles one as the wicked Jack and the other as the loving yet dull Frank (when compared to Jamie). And the Scottish actors like Graham McTavish (Dougal) will bring old Scotland to life on the screen for me. 

From the 1st episode I think they producers will not be shy to include the more sexual aspects of the Outlander books, as they do have this erotic element that actually makes the love between Claire and Jamie the driving force of their relationship which allows it to span centuries, even when they are no longer together. It's that love/passion for each other that keeps them alive in each other's heart and so far to the directors credit, they have not been shy about adding it. I'm looking forward to the Claire Jamie love scenes hopefully to come... I'm also going to enjoy the Scottish history and scenery, and loved the way they so far have included it in the TV series. It's going to be very interesting to me especially as my ancestors are Scottish.

I know Starz will be increasing its revenues with this series' fans all signing up just to see it. There must be millions of us around the world that love these books and I'm sure like me many of them will order the cable channel just to watch this. I'm very happy to see Starz did such a good job in bringing this to life on the screen. So rarely do we get a good adult drama on TV these days, and this will surely be that. I'm liking many of the original show Starz is offering this season like this and Black Sails, Strikback. Who ever is heading their creative development deserves a lot of credit for their selection of shows to produce. I think Starz is catching up to HBO and Showtime in it's original shows and might even surpass them if it keeps producing shows of this quality plus they have a much better selection of movies that the other channels. As a new Starz member, I'd recommend it to others.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":140339,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.4},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Fantasy","Romance"],"datePublished":"2014-08-09","keywords":"scotland,scotsman,year 1743,scottish highlands,sex scene","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1495520/","name":"Caitriona Balfe"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1537825/","name":"Sam Heughan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3795370/","name":"Duncan Lacroix"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0303436/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0410831/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0208971/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0601822/","name":"Ronald D. programme.title: The Night Shift: Turno da Noite
Candice Renoir
Candice Renoir
programme.sub-title: L'Homme Est Un Loup Pour L'Homme
programme.desc:
Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine ","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2819924/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Doctor_Dexter"},"dateCreated":"2016-06-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"The female sitcom-detective cliché","reviewBody":"Over the last decades, in Europe, we've been swamped with the older female detective character with a family in tow. Some have a weak excuse for a husband to emphasise their strength, many others are independent single mothers who struggle with a demanding job and raising their kids. To be honest, I'm not a fan of the genre. Nothing against strong and independent women, au contraire. I just prefer decent detective work above being sucked into the personal life of a fictional character. If I wanted to see family drama I'd go watch a sitcom. It's beyond me why the detective genre has to be muddled with sitcom-esque fluff like this. (I wouldn't buy it, but it's programmed on TV *instead* of a proper detective). I can accept a modest degree of family life. After all, Beck and Wallander have families too. However, they are primarily detectives, and every episode is about solving the case. 

"Candice Renoir" is more sitcom than detectives. And it's just as tacky and kitschy as the name already suggests. A fifty-something big mama, who seems to think she's Brigitte Bardot in the seventies, miraculously becomes the team leader of a small town detective team. She blunders through everything, but 'magically' finds clues in fashion magazines and the likes. She's supposed to portray the strong and independent older woman who can do it all, kids and playing the boss- detective, but it's way to contrived to be the least bit believable. Her character, the rainbow team, the younger cutesy neighbour - who has stamped "love interest" in all caps across his handsome forehead - it's all a stylised light version of a concept we've seen many, many times before. And now it's here again, only worse. Yay. 

To be fair, the acting of the team and other characters varies from passable to decent, but the lead actress is really milking the diva character, and as such, overacting horribly in just about every scene.

It might just about do as daytime TV, on a rainy afternoon, but that's probably me being generous.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1103,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"TV-G","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2013-04-19","keywords":"france,female police officer,police","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0092291/","name":"Cécile Bois"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0501845/","name":"Raphaël Lenglet"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6511436/","name":"Clara Antoons"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011107/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0053077/","name":"Robin Barataud"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0043904/","name":"Brigitte Peskine"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2784794/","name":"Solen Roy-Pagenault"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Promo Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2892283161","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. programme.desc:
Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine ","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2819924/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Doctor_Dexter"},"dateCreated":"2016-06-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"The female sitcom-detective cliché","reviewBody":"Over the last decades, in Europe, we've been swamped with the older female detective character with a family in tow. Some have a weak excuse for a husband to emphasise their strength, many others are independent single mothers who struggle with a demanding job and raising their kids. To be honest, I'm not a fan of the genre. Nothing against strong and independent women, au contraire. I just prefer decent detective work above being sucked into the personal life of a fictional character. If I wanted to see family drama I'd go watch a sitcom. It's beyond me why the detective genre has to be muddled with sitcom-esque fluff like this. (I wouldn't buy it, but it's programmed on TV *instead* of a proper detective). I can accept a modest degree of family life. After all, Beck and Wallander have families too. However, they are primarily detectives, and every episode is about solving the case. 

"Candice Renoir" is more sitcom than detectives. And it's just as tacky and kitschy as the name already suggests. A fifty-something big mama, who seems to think she's Brigitte Bardot in the seventies, miraculously becomes the team leader of a small town detective team. She blunders through everything, but 'magically' finds clues in fashion magazines and the likes. She's supposed to portray the strong and independent older woman who can do it all, kids and playing the boss- detective, but it's way to contrived to be the least bit believable. Her character, the rainbow team, the younger cutesy neighbour - who has stamped "love interest" in all caps across his handsome forehead - it's all a stylised light version of a concept we've seen many, many times before. And now it's here again, only worse. Yay. 

To be fair, the acting of the team and other characters varies from passable to decent, but the lead actress is really milking the diva character, and as such, overacting horribly in just about every scene.

It might just about do as daytime TV, on a rainy afternoon, but that's probably me being generous.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1103,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"TV-G","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2013-04-19","keywords":"france,female police officer,police","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0092291/","name":"Cécile Bois"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0501845/","name":"Raphaël Lenglet"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6511436/","name":"Clara Antoons"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011107/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0053077/","name":"Robin Barataud"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0043904/","name":"Brigitte Peskine"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2784794/","name":"Solen Roy-Pagenault"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Promo Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2892283161","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 2819924, Title: Candice Renoir, --- Description: Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine ","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2819924/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Doctor_Dexter","dateCreated":"2016-06-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"The female sitcom-detective cliché","reviewBody":"Over the last decades, in Europe, we've been swamped with the older female detective character with a family in tow. Some have a weak excuse for a husband to emphasise their strength, many others are independent single mothers who struggle with a demanding job and raising their kids. To be honest, I'm not a fan of the genre. Nothing against strong and independent women, au contraire. I just prefer decent detective work above being sucked into the personal life of a fictional character. If I wanted to see family drama I'd go watch a sitcom. It's beyond me why the detective genre has to be muddled with sitcom-esque fluff like this. (I wouldn't buy it, but it's programmed on TV *instead* of a proper detective). I can accept a modest degree of family life. After all, Beck and Wallander have families too. However, they are primarily detectives, and every episode is about solving the case. 

"Candice Renoir" is more sitcom than detectives. And it's just as tacky and kitschy as the name already suggests. A fifty-something big mama, who seems to think she's Brigitte Bardot in the seventies, miraculously becomes the team leader of a small town detective team. She blunders through everything, but 'magically' finds clues in fashion magazines and the likes. She's supposed to portray the strong and independent older woman who can do it all, kids and playing the boss- detective, but it's way to contrived to be the least bit believable. Her character, the rainbow team, the younger cutesy neighbour - who has stamped "love interest" in all caps across his handsome forehead - it's all a stylised light version of a concept we've seen many, many times before. And now it's here again, only worse. Yay. 

To be fair, the acting of the team and other characters varies from passable to decent, but the lead actress is really milking the diva character, and as such, overacting horribly in just about every scene.

It might just about do as daytime TV, on a rainy afternoon, but that's probably me being generous.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1103,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5,"contentRating":"TV-G","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2013-04-19","keywords":"france,female police officer,police","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0092291/","name":"Cécile Bois","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0501845/","name":"Raphaël Lenglet","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6511436/","name":"Clara Antoons"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011107/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0053077/","name":"Robin Barataud","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0043904/","name":"Brigitte Peskine","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2784794/","name":"Solen Roy-Pagenault"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Promo Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2892283161","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Pascal Lahmani, Nicolas Picard-Dreyfuss, Stéphane Malhuret, Olivier Barma, Raphaël Lenglet

It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Her daily routine ","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2819924/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Doctor_Dexter","dateCreated":"2016-06-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"The female sitcom-detective cliché","reviewBody":"Over the last decades, in Europe, we've been swamped with the older female detective character with a family in tow. Some have a weak excuse for a husband to emphasise their strength, many others are independent single mothers who struggle with a demanding job and raising their kids. To be honest, I'm not a fan of the genre. Nothing against strong and independent women, au contraire. I just prefer decent detective work above being sucked into the personal life of a fictional character. If I wanted to see family drama I'd go watch a sitcom. It's beyond me why the detective genre has to be muddled with sitcom-esque fluff like this. (I wouldn't buy it, but it's programmed on TV *instead* of a proper detective). I can accept a modest degree of family life. After all, Beck and Wallander have families too. However, they are primarily detectives, and every episode is about solving the case. 

"Candice Renoir" is more sitcom than detectives. And it's just as tacky and kitschy as the name already suggests. A fifty-something big mama, who seems to think she's Brigitte Bardot in the seventies, miraculously becomes the team leader of a small town detective team. She blunders through everything, but 'magically' finds clues in fashion magazines and the likes. She's supposed to portray the strong and independent older woman who can do it all, kids and playing the boss- detective, but it's way to contrived to be the least bit believable. Her character, the rainbow team, the younger cutesy neighbour - who has stamped "love interest" in all caps across his handsome forehead - it's all a stylised light version of a concept we've seen many, many times before. And now it's here again, only worse. Yay. 

To be fair, the acting of the team and other characters varies from passable to decent, but the lead actress is really milking the diva character, and as such, overacting horribly in just about every scene.

It might just about do as daytime TV, on a rainy afternoon, but that's probably me being generous.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1103,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5,"contentRating":"TV-G","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2013-04-19","keywords":"france,female police officer,police","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0092291/","name":"Cécile Bois","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0501845/","name":"Raphaël Lenglet","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6511436/","name":"Clara Antoons"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011107/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0053077/","name":"Robin Barataud","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0043904/","name":"Brigitte Peskine","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2784794/","name":"Solen Roy-Pagenault"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Promo Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2892283161","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Pascal Lahmani, Nicolas Picard-Dreyfuss, Stéphane Malhuret, Olivier Barma, Raphaël Lenglet

programme.title: Morning Show Mysteries: Contagem para a Morte
programme.desc: Quando um estimado dono de supermercado é morto, a dona de restaurantes e chef da televisão Billie Blessing envolve-se na investigação do que parece ser a obra de um assassino em série inteligente e sinistro.

programme.title: Morning Show Mysteries: Morte por Medida
programme.desc: A melhor amiga da chef Billie Blessing, Marian, é contratada para redecorar o estúdio de televisão. Quando a irmã gémea de Marian é assassinada, Billie tem de investigar os amigos chegados delas para descobrir o assassino.

programme.title: Aprender a Conduzir
programme.desc: Wendy, uma escritora nova-iorquina, vê o seu casamento chegar ao fim. Decide então ter aulas de condução com um instrutor Sikh, também ele a viver os seus dramas pessoais. Juntos encontram a coragem para tomarem controlo das suas próprias vidas.

programme.title: Expiação
programme.desc: Verão de 1935. A família Tallis vive tranquilamente na sua mansão. Além disso, a pequena Briony já descobriu a sua vocação: quer ser romancista. Mas quando, do alto dos seus 13 anos, surpreende a irmã Cecilia com o filho do caseiro, Robbie, a sua reação ciumenta e ingénua vai provocar uma tragédia.

programme.title: Miss Detective
programme.desc: A agente do FBI Gracie é eleita para uma delicada missão onde terá de atuar disfarçada de uma deslumbrante concorrente que aspira tornar-se na próxima Miss Estados Unidos. Mas Gracie não possui propriamente, à primeira vista, o perfil indicado para esta missão.

programme.title: Julie e Julia
programme.desc: No final dos anos 40, o livro de cozinha "Mastering the Art of French Cooking", de Julia Child, tornou-se um fenómeno nos EUA. Décadas mais tarde, o livro inspirou Julie Powell, em início de carreira, a preparar 524 receitas em 365 dias, apresentando a uma nova geração a magia da cozinha francesa.

programme.title: As Estrelas Não Morrem em Liverpool
programme.desc: O que começa como um vibrante caso de amor entre uma lendária "femme fatale" do grande ecrã e um jovem ator, depressa se transforma em algo mais profundo e ele torna-se na única pessoa em que a atriz pode confiar. Mas a sua paixão será posta à prova...

programme.title: A Vingança Serve-se Fria
programme.desc: Um romântico incurável acredita ter encontrado o verdadeiro amor numa mulher mais velha, até descobrir que esta é casada e apenas se quer vingar do seu marido negligente.

programme.title: Esse Jogo É para Três
programme.desc: Shante Smith é especialista em relacionamentos e usa os seus conhecimentos da mente masculina para ajudar as mulheres a conseguirem o que querem.

programme.title: A Mudança das Estações
programme.desc: À medida que se vão conhecendo melhor, a hostilidade existente entre um agricultor viúvo e uma ornitóloga atrevida, que veio para a sua quinta com o objetivo de salvar uma família de cisnes, transforma-se em algo mais...

programme.title: The Tudors
Os Tudors
programme.desc:
The Tudors: Created by Michael Hirst. With Jonathan Rhys Meyers, Henry Cavill, Anthony Brophy, James Frain. A dramatic series about the reign and marriages of King Henry VIII." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0758790/","name":"The Tudors","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTI2MDU0MjEzMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTA1NTM2MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A dramatic series about the reign and marriages of King Henry VIII.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0758790/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"lilwolfe006"},"dateCreated":"2007-03-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not quite like Rome, but in the spirit of historically set series, a good replacement","reviewBody":"With the proposed ending of Rome - I think a lot of viewers will automatically turn to The Tudors as a replacement. I have watched the first episode and find that the acting and set alone can pull a viewer in. It is different than Rome, but the same core passions of humanity are present.

I am deeply saddened that Rome will be ending after such a short run, and I think that were it not, The Tudors would find far more competition. As it is, both shows are proving that there is an audience for historical dramas and I hope such endeavors continue in the future.

The Tudors has a quality cast with attractive actors for both genders to attach to. I cannot make an honest opinion yet on the plots and direction of the series until I see more of it, but the imagery alone is a good start for this series.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":71645,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","History","Romance"],"datePublished":"2007-04-01","keywords":"sex scene,king,royalty,king henry viii,english court","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001667/","name":"Jonathan Rhys Meyers"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0147147/","name":"Henry Cavill"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0112390/","name":"Anthony Brophy"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0078130/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0052980/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0082215/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0386694/","name":"Michael Hirst"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Tudors: Season 4: The Final Season","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3776092441","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTgwY2E4Y2EtNmMyNy00MjFiLTg0ODgtNWVhMzhlYTQ0OTk0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTgwY2E4Y2EtNmMyNy00MjFiLTg0ODgtNWVhMzhlYTQ0OTk0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for The Tudors: The Final Season"}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Candice Renoir
Candice Renoir
programme.sub-title: Mieux Vaut Faire Envie Que Pitié
programme.desc:
Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine ","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2819924/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Doctor_Dexter"},"dateCreated":"2016-06-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"The female sitcom-detective cliché","reviewBody":"Over the last decades, in Europe, we've been swamped with the older female detective character with a family in tow. Some have a weak excuse for a husband to emphasise their strength, many others are independent single mothers who struggle with a demanding job and raising their kids. To be honest, I'm not a fan of the genre. Nothing against strong and independent women, au contraire. I just prefer decent detective work above being sucked into the personal life of a fictional character. If I wanted to see family drama I'd go watch a sitcom. It's beyond me why the detective genre has to be muddled with sitcom-esque fluff like this. (I wouldn't buy it, but it's programmed on TV *instead* of a proper detective). I can accept a modest degree of family life. After all, Beck and Wallander have families too. However, they are primarily detectives, and every episode is about solving the case. 

"Candice Renoir" is more sitcom than detectives. And it's just as tacky and kitschy as the name already suggests. A fifty-something big mama, who seems to think she's Brigitte Bardot in the seventies, miraculously becomes the team leader of a small town detective team. She blunders through everything, but 'magically' finds clues in fashion magazines and the likes. She's supposed to portray the strong and independent older woman who can do it all, kids and playing the boss- detective, but it's way to contrived to be the least bit believable. Her character, the rainbow team, the younger cutesy neighbour - who has stamped "love interest" in all caps across his handsome forehead - it's all a stylised light version of a concept we've seen many, many times before. And now it's here again, only worse. Yay. 

To be fair, the acting of the team and other characters varies from passable to decent, but the lead actress is really milking the diva character, and as such, overacting horribly in just about every scene.

It might just about do as daytime TV, on a rainy afternoon, but that's probably me being generous.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1103,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"TV-G","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2013-04-19","keywords":"france,female police officer,police","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0092291/","name":"Cécile Bois"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0501845/","name":"Raphaël Lenglet"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6511436/","name":"Clara Antoons"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011107/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0053077/","name":"Robin Barataud"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0043904/","name":"Brigitte Peskine"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2784794/","name":"Solen Roy-Pagenault"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Promo Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2892283161","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

"Candice Renoir" is more sitcom than detectives. And it's just as tacky and kitschy as the name already suggests. A fifty-something big mama, who seems to think she's Brigitte Bardot in the seventies, miraculously becomes the team leader of a small town detective team. She blunders through everything, but 'magically' finds clues in fashion magazines and the likes. She's supposed to portray the strong and independent older woman who can do it all, kids and playing the boss- detective, but it's way to contrived to be the least bit believable. Her character, the rainbow team, the younger cutesy neighbour - who has stamped "love interest" in all caps across his handsome forehead - it's all a stylised light version of a concept we've seen many, many times before. And now it's here again, only worse. Yay. 

To be fair, the acting of the team and other characters varies from passable to decent, but the lead actress is really milking the diva character, and as such, overacting horribly in just about every scene.

It might just about do as daytime TV, on a rainy afternoon, but that's probably me being generous.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1103,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5,"contentRating":"TV-G","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2013-04-19","keywords":"france,female police officer,police","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0092291/","name":"Cécile Bois","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0501845/","name":"Raphaël Lenglet","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6511436/","name":"Clara Antoons"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011107/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0053077/","name":"Robin Barataud","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0043904/","name":"Brigitte Peskine","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2784794/","name":"Solen Roy-Pagenault"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Promo Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2892283161","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Pascal Lahmani, Nicolas Picard-Dreyfuss, Stéphane Malhuret, Olivier Barma, Raphaël Lenglet

programme.title: Candice Renoir
Candice Renoir
programme.desc:
Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine ","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2819924/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Doctor_Dexter"},"dateCreated":"2016-06-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"The female sitcom-detective cliché","reviewBody":"Over the last decades, in Europe, we've been swamped with the older female detective character with a family in tow. Some have a weak excuse for a husband to emphasise their strength, many others are independent single mothers who struggle with a demanding job and raising their kids. To be honest, I'm not a fan of the genre. Nothing against strong and independent women, au contraire. I just prefer decent detective work above being sucked into the personal life of a fictional character. If I wanted to see family drama I'd go watch a sitcom. It's beyond me why the detective genre has to be muddled with sitcom-esque fluff like this. (I wouldn't buy it, but it's programmed on TV *instead* of a proper detective). I can accept a modest degree of family life. After all, Beck and Wallander have families too. However, they are primarily detectives, and every episode is about solving the case. 

"Candice Renoir" is more sitcom than detectives. And it's just as tacky and kitschy as the name already suggests. A fifty-something big mama, who seems to think she's Brigitte Bardot in the seventies, miraculously becomes the team leader of a small town detective team. She blunders through everything, but 'magically' finds clues in fashion magazines and the likes. She's supposed to portray the strong and independent older woman who can do it all, kids and playing the boss- detective, but it's way to contrived to be the least bit believable. Her character, the rainbow team, the younger cutesy neighbour - who has stamped "love interest" in all caps across his handsome forehead - it's all a stylised light version of a concept we've seen many, many times before. And now it's here again, only worse. Yay. 

To be fair, the acting of the team and other characters varies from passable to decent, but the lead actress is really milking the diva character, and as such, overacting horribly in just about every scene.

It might just about do as daytime TV, on a rainy afternoon, but that's probably me being generous.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1103,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"TV-G","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2013-04-19","keywords":"france,female police officer,police","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0092291/","name":"Cécile Bois"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0501845/","name":"Raphaël Lenglet"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6511436/","name":"Clara Antoons"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011107/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0053077/","name":"Robin Barataud"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0043904/","name":"Brigitte Peskine"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2784794/","name":"Solen Roy-Pagenault"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Promo Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2892283161","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine ","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2819924/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Doctor_Dexter"},"dateCreated":"2016-06-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"The female sitcom-detective cliché","reviewBody":"Over the last decades, in Europe, we've been swamped with the older female detective character with a family in tow. Some have a weak excuse for a husband to emphasise their strength, many others are independent single mothers who struggle with a demanding job and raising their kids. To be honest, I'm not a fan of the genre. Nothing against strong and independent women, au contraire. I just prefer decent detective work above being sucked into the personal life of a fictional character. If I wanted to see family drama I'd go watch a sitcom. It's beyond me why the detective genre has to be muddled with sitcom-esque fluff like this. (I wouldn't buy it, but it's programmed on TV *instead* of a proper detective). I can accept a modest degree of family life. After all, Beck and Wallander have families too. However, they are primarily detectives, and every episode is about solving the case. 

"Candice Renoir" is more sitcom than detectives. And it's just as tacky and kitschy as the name already suggests. A fifty-something big mama, who seems to think she's Brigitte Bardot in the seventies, miraculously becomes the team leader of a small town detective team. She blunders through everything, but 'magically' finds clues in fashion magazines and the likes. She's supposed to portray the strong and independent older woman who can do it all, kids and playing the boss- detective, but it's way to contrived to be the least bit believable. Her character, the rainbow team, the younger cutesy neighbour - who has stamped "love interest" in all caps across his handsome forehead - it's all a stylised light version of a concept we've seen many, many times before. And now it's here again, only worse. Yay. 

To be fair, the acting of the team and other characters varies from passable to decent, but the lead actress is really milking the diva character, and as such, overacting horribly in just about every scene.

It might just about do as daytime TV, on a rainy afternoon, but that's probably me being generous.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1103,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"TV-G","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2013-04-19","keywords":"france,female police officer,police","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0092291/","name":"Cécile Bois"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0501845/","name":"Raphaël Lenglet"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6511436/","name":"Clara Antoons"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011107/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0053077/","name":"Robin Barataud"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0043904/","name":"Brigitte Peskine"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2784794/","name":"Solen Roy-Pagenault"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Promo Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2892283161","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="
